titleStmt.title: The sham-lawyer, or, The lucky extravagant as it was damnably acted at the Theatre-Royal in Drury-Lane.
titleStmt.author: Drake, James, 1667-1707.
Fletcher, John, 1579-1625. Wit without money.
Fletcher, John, 1579-1625. Spanish curate.

notesStmt.note: Taken from Fletcher's "Wit without money" and Fletcher and Massinger's "The Spanish curate."
Attributed to James Drake. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
